content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE mySchema.WorkCenter_MDX
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE WorkCenter_MDX_new(
     Arbpl VARCHAR(MAX), 
     Kostl VARCHAR(MAX), 
     Ktext VARCHAR(MAX), 
     Lstar VARCHAR(MAX),
     Verwe VARCHAR(MAX), 
     WcKat VARCHAR(MAX),
     Werks VARCHAR(MAX),

     
) WITH (
         DATA_SOURCE = myStagingContainer,
         LOCATION = 'WorkCenter_MDX/Processed/*.parquet',
         FILE_FORMAT = myParquetFormat
         
);
